thread.title: ArcBest Corporation to Appear at the Cowen and Company 8th Annual Global Transportation Conference
thread.title_full: ArcBest Corporation to Appear at the Cowen and Company 8th Annual Global Transportation Conference - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: ArcBest Corporation to Appear at the Cowen and Company 8th Annual Global Transportation Conference
text:
ArcBest Corporation
FORT SMITH, Ark. , Sept. 3, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- ArcBest Corporation sm (Nasdaq: ARCB) will appear at the Cowen and Company 8th Annual Global Transportation Conference in Boston on Thursday, September 10 , from 1:05 p.m. until 1:35 p.m. ET . David R. Cobb , Vice President - Chief Financial Officer, will do a company presentation. The live program will be webcast (in a listen-only mode) and an archive will be available following the presentation.
To access the live audio, please go to the company's website at arcb.com . This presentation will be archived through October 30, 2015 .
ABOUT ARCBEST
ArcBest Corporation sm (Nasdaq: ARCB) solves complex logistics and transportation challenges. Our companies and brands – ABF Freight sm , ABF Logistics sm , Panther Premium Logistics ® , FleetNet America ® , U-Pack ® and ArcBest Technologies – apply the skill and the will with every shipment and supply chain solution, household move or vehicle repair. ArcBest finds a way.
For more information, visit arcb.com, abf.com, pantherpremium.com, fleetnetamerica.com and upack.com. ArcBest Corporation sm . The Skill & The Will sm .
Investor Relations Contact: David Humphrey
Title: Vice President – Investor Relations
Phone: 479-785-6200
Email: dhumphrey@arcb.com
